titleStmt.title: The white stone: or, A learned and choice treatise of assurance very usefull for all, but especially weak believers. By Nathanael Culverwel, master of arts, and lately fellow of Emmanuel Colledge in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Culverwel, Nathanael, d. 1651?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Rothwel, at the Fountain and Bear in Cheap side,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles, California.
